title.en: A Supplication to the Life and Liberation of Rigdzin Jalü Dorje

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: The Primordial Protector, Küntuzangpo, the Buddha of Unchanging Light,
text.en-trans: dömé gönpo kunzang ö mingyur

text.en: Who arises as the appearing-radiance of the gathering of the five wisdoms;
text.en-trans: tsalnang yeshe rik ngé tsombu shar

text.en: Transforming into the dance of compassion, the nirmāṇakāya that tames beings
text.en-trans: tukjé gar gyur drodul trulpé ku

text.en: And is indivisible from the three kāyas, Lord Amitāyus,
text.en-trans: ku sum yermé gönpo tsé tayé

text.en: The embodiment of compassion, noble and supreme Holder of the White Lotus (Avalokiteśvara),
text.en-trans: nyingjé rang zuk pakchok pekar chang

text.en: The Lake Born Nirmāṇakāya (Padmasambhava), who appears in response to beings,
text.en-trans: dro ngor nangwa tsokyé trulpé ku

text.en: Lord of the Family, Vajrasattva, hero Garab Dorje,
text.en-trans: rikdak dorsem garab pawo dang

text.en: And the inseparable Guru Tötrengtsel, I supplicate.
text.en-trans: yermé tötreng tsal la solwa deb

text.en: For the sake of those to be tamed, the red-faced Tibetans,
text.en-trans: gang khyö dong mar bö kyi dulwé dön

text.en: You filled the whole of Tibet from center to its borders with treasures.
text.en-trans: ta ü tamché ter gyi kang né kyang

text.en: I supplicate you and your emanated heart-disciples, the king and subjects,
text.en-trans: gang dang tuksé jebang trulpé ku

text.en: Who opened the gateway to those profound treasures.
text.en-trans: zabter gojé tsok la solwa deb

text.en: Currently, unbearable suffering is greatly increasing
text.en-trans: dengdü nga trak tamé semchen kün

text.en: For all sentient beings of the final five-hundred-year period.
text.en-trans: zö ké dukngal ché cher chepé tsé

text.en: During this time, I supplicate the supreme, single-embodied emanation
text.en-trans: drimé garab pejung bi ma lé

text.en: Of Drimé Özer, Garab Dorje, Pema Jungné, and Vimalamitra.
text.en-trans: trulpa chikdü chok der solwa deb

text.en: You entered the womb never wavering from samādhi.
text.en-trans: lhum su zhuk né tingdzin mi yo zhing

text.en: Three days after your birth, you roamed among the assembly of ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: tsepé zhak sum khandrö tsokdral drim

text.en: And when you were ten months old, you received empowerment from them—
text.en-trans: da chü dü su khandrö wangkurwé

text.en: I supplicate the naturally arisen nirmāṇakāya.
text.en-trans: rangjung trulpé ku la solwa deb

text.en: At the age of the two, in Zangdokpelri (the Copper-Coloured Mountain), the realm of the awareness-holders,
text.en-trans: drangja sum né palri rigdzin zhing

text.en: You beheld the prominent nirmāṇakāya who conferred empowerment and blessings upon you—
text.en-trans: trulzhir jal né wangkur jin gyi lab

text.en: I supplicate the one who is always watched over
text.en-trans: pawo khandro rikden tsok kün gyi

text.en: By the heroes and ḍākinīs of all the noble families.
text.en-trans: meltsé taktu kyang der solwa deb

text.en: Recalling your previous lives, you searched for your lama, the Lord of the Family,1
text.en-trans: ngön né jedren rikdak lama tsal

text.en: Who lovingly and compassionately accepted you [as a disciple].
text.en-trans: tukjé jezung dü kyi yul lé gyal

text.en: Victorious over the hordes of demons, your potential as a Dharma Lord was brought forth—
text.en-trans: chö kyi dakpo rik kyi nyugu tsé

text.en: I supplicate the one whose auspicious connections ripened on time.
text.en-trans: tendrel dü su min der solwa deb

text.en: From a young age, with the sadness born from renunciation,
text.en-trans: zhönnü dü né ngejung kyoshé kyi

text.en: You continuously saw daily appearances as an illusory dream,
text.en-trans: gyü kul nyin nang milam gyuma dang

text.en: And at night you mingled the kāyas and the spheres of rainbow light—
text.en-trans: tsen nang ku dang jazer tiklé dré

text.en: I supplicate the one whose previous karma ripened on time.
text.en-trans: ngön lé dü su min der solwa deb

text.en: When you reached twelve, you entered the path of generation and completion [stage practices].
text.en-trans: chusum lön né kyedzok lam du zhuk

text.en: During the day, you received oral instructions of the Lama, the Lord of the Family,
text.en-trans: nyin dü rikdak lamé zhal tri dang

text.en: And during the night the heroes and ḍākinīs symbolically transmitted [the teachings]
text.en-trans: tsen nang pawo daki datröpé

text.en: By which you traversed the stages and paths in an instant— I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: salam kechik drö der solwa deb

text.en: When you reached fourteen, you obtained an inventory of treasures.
text.en-trans: cho nga lön né ter gyi kha jang tob

text.en: By the compassion of the Lama and the blessings of Orgyen (Guru Rinpoche),
text.en-trans: lamé tukkyé orgyen jinlab kyi

text.en: You had the authority over earth and wisdom-mind treasures—
text.en-trans: sa ter gongpé ter du wanggyur né

text.en: I supplicate the one who has the command of the secret ḍākinī treasury.
text.en-trans: khandrö sangdzö wang der solwa deb

text.en: When you reached nineteen, having mastered the generation and completion phases of maturation and liberation,
text.en-trans: nyishu lön né mindrol kyedzok la

text.en: You obtained permission from the Lord of the Family.
text.en-trans: nga nyé rikdak nangwa tob né lar

text.en: Once again, in keeping with the prophecy of the heroes and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: pawo khandrö lungten jizhin du

text.en: You maintained the yogic observances—I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: naljor chöpa kyang der solwa deb

text.en: You attained the supreme accomplishment of the lama and deity
text.en-trans: lama yidam ngödrub chok nyé zhing

text.en: And defeated the attacks of unruly demons by completing the approach and accomplishment [stages of deity practice],
text.en-trans: nyendrub tarchin sek nen penpa yi

text.en: And by burning, suppressing, and casting away [as found in those practices]—
text.en-trans: ma rung dü kyi yulngo pam dzepé

text.en: I supplicate you, Yeshe Rölpa’i Dorje (Vajra of Primordial-Wisdom Display).
text.en-trans: yeshe rolpé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: You obtained the subtle, yogic mudrā of the generation phase,
text.en-trans: kyerim chakgya trawé naljor nyé

text.en: Perfected the qualities of the ten signs of the completion stage,
text.en-trans: dzokrim tak chu yönten ta ru chin

text.en: And held the pure vital-essence in the central channel—
text.en-trans: dangmé tiklé a wa dhu tir ching

text.en: I supplicate the supreme and accomplished Awareness-Holder.
text.en-trans: drub nyé rigdzin chok der solwa deb

text.en: By the [practice] of Cutting Through (trekchö), you mixed appearances and mind, thus destroying subject-object grasping.
text.en-trans: trekchö nang sem dré shing zungdzin zhik

text.en: Relying on the [energy] waves, you beheld the resulting suchness.
text.en-trans: walab la ten drebü denyi tong

text.en: Through the [practice] of Direct Crossing (tögel), the experiences and visions were increased to their perfect culmination—
text.en-trans: tögal nyam nang gongpel ta dzokpé

text.en: I supplicate Trülzhig Jalü Dorje (Indestructible Rainbow Body that Dismantles Delusion).
text.en-trans: trulzhik jalü dorjér solwa deb

text.en: In the experiential appearances of the clear light of dreams,
text.en-trans: milam ösal nyam kyi nangwa la

text.en: You abided in the Tiers of Bliss and other celestial and terrestrial realms.
text.en-trans: dé jé tsek dang khachö sachö né

text.en: You roamed among the assembly of awareness-holders, heroes, and ḍākinīs—
text.en-trans: rigdzin pawo kha drötsok dral drim

text.en: I supplicate at the feet of Traktung Pawo (Blood Drinking Hero).
text.en-trans: traktung pawö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Although you did not study the conventional fields of knowledge,
text.en-trans: tanyé shejé né la ma jang yang

text.en: You completely unraveled the chakra of the Wheel of Enjoyment
text.en-trans: lhenkyé yeshe dewa chenpo yi

text.en: By the great bliss of the innate, primordial wisdom—
text.en-trans: longchö khorlö tsakhor yong zhikpé

text.en: I supplicate Dewa’i Dorje Pel (Glorious, Blissful Vajra).
text.en-trans: dewé da jé pal der solwa deb

text.en: You seized the royal seat of the essential Dharmakāya;
text.en-trans: ngowo chökü gyalsar nga nyé kyang

text.en: Still, you performed deeds to tame impure beings
text.en-trans: ma dak drowé lö lo tün nang dang

text.en: According to their devotion, intelligence, and common perceptions—
text.en-trans: tsampar gang la gang dul dön dzepé

text.en: I supplicate at the feet of Tutob Pawo (Hero of Power and Strength).
text.en-trans: tutob pawö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: To benefit the fortunate ones of the highest capacity,
text.en-trans: yangsang lümé khandrö tuk tik chö

text.en: You properly taught the cycle without letters, the pith instructions of the hearing lineage,
text.en-trans: mengak nyengyü yigé möpé kor

text.en: The doctrine ofThe Extremely Secret Heart-Essence of the Formless Ḍākinīs.2
text.en-trans: wang rab kalden döndu lek ten né

text.en: I supplicate the teacher of the path of the rainbow body of light.
text.en-trans: jalü ökü lam tön la solwa deb

text.en: With great love and compassion, you held limitless beings,
text.en-trans: zukchen zukmé drowa tadak kün

text.en: Both those with form and those without form,
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé chenpö jezung né

text.en: And, directly and indirectly, ushered them through the gates of maturation and liberation—
text.en-trans: ngö sam gyü né mindrol gor chuk ching

text.en: I supplicate the one who enacts the robust deeds of a perfected buddha.
text.en-trans: tsentab dzoksang gyé dzé la solwa deb

text.en: We who have become your disciples
text.en-trans: dak sok khyé kyi duljar gyurpa nam

text.en: Are enveloped in the darkness of the intense sufferings of karma and afflictions.
text.en-trans: lé nyön dukngal drakpö mün tum shing

text.en: We are blind to the qualities of your three secrets, so difficult to fathom,
text.en-trans: khyö kyi sang sum ting pak kawa yi

text.en: And the view that would guide us.
text.en-trans: yönten tawé dren jé ché ré long

text.en: By the power of negative karma, we are conflicted with doubt and wrong views
text.en-trans: lé ngen wang gi tetsom lokta truk

text.en: And overpowered by the demonic masses of wrong aspirations.
text.en-trans: lok mön dü kyi dé tsok wang shor zhing

text.en: Our root and branch samayas have deteriorated, been transgressed, and torn apart.
text.en-trans: tsawa yenlak damtsik nyam gal ral

text.en: With fervent, heartfelt regret, we pray for forgiveness.
text.en-trans: tingné gyöpa drakpö zöpar sol

text.en: Influenced by ignorance and its close friend, wrong views,
text.en-trans: mong dang nyam drok wang shor lokpar té

text.en: I have abused and slandered,
text.en-trans: shé zhing kurpa deb dang demé kyi

text.en: And intentionally demonstrated impure behavior in the presence of those without faith.
text.en-trans: nang ngor samzhin ma dak tsul ten né

text.en: I have given rise to doubt and have amassed negative connections,
text.en-trans: tetsom kyé ching ngen drel gyi düpé

text.en: And because of this, I have not realized your unfathomable and all-subsuming enlightened mind.
text.en-trans: ting pak kawé gongpa ma tok shing

text.en: I have opposed your command, upset and disturbed your mind, proclaimed faults,
text.en-trans: ka gal tuk truk tuk sün kyön jö ching

text.en: And have diminished my pure perception that sees all that the master does as good.
text.en-trans: chi dzé lek tong daknang drib gyurpa

text.en: By remembering your qualities, I pray for forgiveness.
text.en-trans: yönten jesu drenpé zöpar sol

text.en: Now, by the blessings transferred from the wisdom-mind of the guru,
text.en-trans: lamé tukgyü gongpé jinlab pö

text.en: My negative karma and habitual tendencies are diminished.
text.en-trans: dani lé ngen bakchak sab gyurpé

text.en: Thus, from my heart, I vow not to hold onto wrong concepts,
text.en-trans: lokpar mi tok nying né damcha dzin

text.en: And I pray you lovingly hold me close.
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpö jesu zung du sol

text.en: Protector, you hide your qualities and display faults,
text.en-trans: gön khyö yönten gab ching kyön tönpé

text.en: So that we impure sentient beings are fooled.
text.en-trans: ma dak semchen gowo mong gyur ching

text.en: For the karmically fortunate beings under the sway of doubt,
text.en-trans: lekal denpa ang tetsom wang gyur chir

text.en: Please reveal your unfathomable qualities.
text.en-trans: ting pak kawé yönten ten du sol

text.en: The vajra body is not subject to decay or decline;
text.en-trans: dorjé ku la dré gü mi nga yang

text.en: Yet I pray that your life reaches its fullest extent, so that you fully accomplish the benefit of beings;
text.en-trans: kutsé tarchin dro dön yongdzok shing

text.en: And thereafter, until cyclic existence is emptied,
text.en-trans: dadung khorwé jikten matongwar

text.en: Please act to benefit beings through a myriad of emanations.
text.en-trans: natsok trulpé dro dön dzé du sol

text.en: By the fruit of this one-pointed supplication,
text.en-trans: tsechik solwa tabpé drebu yi

text.en: May I perfectly serve you and fully benefit beings.
text.en-trans: zhabtok tarchin dro dön yongdzok né

text.en: Having done so, may the defilements and habitual tendencies be completely exhausted;
text.en-trans: zakpa bakchak chepa yong zé ching

text.en: May I perfect the four visions and attain the rainbow body!
text.en-trans: nang zhi tarchin jalü drubpar shok

text.en: By this virtue, may sentient beings’ ocean of suffering dry up.
text.en-trans: gewé dro kün dukngal tso kem né

text.en: May they recognize the reflexive awareness, the essence of the Sugata.
text.en-trans: deshek nyingpo rangrig ngoshé shing

text.en: May the fruit of emptiness-bodhicitta ripen!
text.en-trans: tongnyi changchub sem kyi dré min né

text.en: May they be assured in the realms of the victors of the three kāyas!
text.en-trans: ku sum gyalwé zhing du ukyung shok
